itemDisplayName: Azure Machine Learning end-to-end secure setup
description: This set of Bicep templates demonstrates how to set up Azure Machine Learning end-to-end in a secure set up. This reference implementation includes the Workspace, a CPU compute cluster, a GPU compute cluster, compute instance and attached private AKS cluster.
summary: This set of Bicep templates demonstrates how to set up Azure Machine Learning end-to-end in a secure set up.
